answers.answer: U could be dehydrated. Do u have migraines as they can also cause blurred vision, as does Diabetes. U should see ur doctor and get checked out.
I'd also check your heart rate even though you are young.  You may be pushing it too hard and need to keep your heart rate in the 'safe' zone.  check with your doctor!!

question: For the past month or so, whenever I exercise I'll see these bright colored spots in my vision (they look somewhat like afterimages) and start to feel lightheaded.Sometimes my vision will even blur and I'll get extremely dizzy. I was sick for two weeks a little while ago with some sinus infection, if that makes a difference.I'm a teenager and I've been an athlete all my life, so I have no idea why this is happening. Any ideas what this could be from?
title: Help!! Seeing spots/dizziness during exercise?
